about_the_game:
About "MetaZoo: Cryptid Clash

Now you can play the "MetaZoo CCG," digitally, anywhere! Open packs, build spellbooks(decks), and challenge your friends around the world!

Play Matches at Any Level!

The full MetaZoo experience is available to anyone of every skill level. The in game tutorials(coming soon) and tool tips will help guide you in your journey into becoming a Master Caster!

Break the 4th Wall!

MetaZoo is a unique game where your surroundings matter! Most pages have unique Fourth Wall effects that are active depending on the environment or triggered by specific items. Such as Jack Frost costing less to play in Winter, or Quetzalcoatlus dealing more damage if you have a lightbulb! These effects will also automatically be activated in rotating pseudo formats, allowing players to utilize their entire collections!

Features

As well as in game rewards for climbing the leader boards and completing achievements, there will also be the opportunity to obtain real world rewards such as exclusive promo cards for the MetaZoo CCG!

About "MetaZoo!"


MetaZoo is a collectible card game like no other, where the world's most intriguing cryptids, known as Beasties, come to life. With an incredibly diverse collection of folklore from around the world, players will immerse themselves in an adventure filled with magic, mystery, and danger. Form contracts with powerful Beasties and enlist them to fight by your side as you journey beyond the Veil and discover the secrets of the world.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------
This game contains in-game purchases of virtual currencies used for gaining in-game items at random.

short_description: MetaZoo: Cryptid Clash is a free-to-play fast paced strategic card game where your surroundings matter, based on the original Collectable Card Game. Join forces with cryptids like Mothman, Bigfoot, Quetzalcoatlus, and Loveland Frogman to battle your friends around the world!
